summary: Just that magic touch ' for your game
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][font=New Times Roman][img]https://i.gyazo.com/50d167e4f428683d5f3cfe157ca81328.png[/img]
────────────────────────────────────────────

Well, I started this as a test, after a time I had seeing those dull "af" glaciers, I wanted to make them more eye-candy for high end modded games.
This makes glaciers transparent ish' , I have included both "Non Rubble" and "Rubble version", whatever you prefer. [size=1]I prefer non rubble[/size]

───────────────────────────────────────────────────

[/font][img]https://i.gyazo.com/edb162324d4bb2bea7b80f62392bec6d.jpg[/img]

[img]https://i.gyazo.com/9eeceb7f61845d8ef8ed4a3e3b2afa5f.jpg[/img][font=New Times Roman]

───────────────────────────────────────────────────

[size=5]
Bugs I encountered :
Some random mesh clipping in some places.[/size]
[size=5][color=#ff0000]ENB Users TURN OFF YOUR TEMPORAL ANTI-ALIASING, CAUSES ALOT OF FLICKERING[/color]

────────────────────────────────────────────

[color=#85200c]Torch [/color]and [color=#ff7700]Fire[/color] (magic) meshes edited.
So no longer those edges around the firespells and torches. (Fire Simmer Effect Is Gone)

────────────────────────────────────────────

[img]https://i.gyazo.com/012c7d3a31800a1c1a67a8d9a1ea49c5.png[/img]

───────────────────────────────────────────────────

By far the easiest way.

Installation NMM : just lik the button in the file section

Uninstallation NMM : [size=1]don't do it ples[/size]

────────────────────────────────────────────

Installation Manual
[color=#1e84cc](Make Copy of your mesh files in[/color] [color=#bf9000]Skyrim/Data/meshes/landscape/ice/..)[/color] [color=#741b47]Make a own folder for them like, (Skyrim Original Ice Meshes)
[/color]
1. Extract the files from my mod to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary. (If you see that it doesn't match your folder structure)
3. Copy the data folder to (Skyrim folder) \Skyrim (Where TESV.exe is located)
4. Overwrite always.

Uninstallation Manual
1. [color=#ff0000]Delete the files in[/color] [color=#bf9000]Skyrim/Data/meshes/landscape/ice/..[/color]
2. [color=#741b47]Copy the files from the folder you made before (Skyrim Original Ice Meshes)[/color]
3. [color=#1e84cc]Paste them into[/color] [color=#bf9000](Skyrim/Data/meshes/landscape/ice)[/color]
4. Done

────────────────────────────────────────────

I'll be adding my own textures soon. And going to cover other ice sources in Skyrim, please hold you pants.

This is my first mod, going to be doing more. [color=#1e84cc]And if anyone is interested about making a video about this, man that would be amazin'[/color]

Feel free to comment.

[color=#f1c232]and Endorse!

Thanks for supporting everyone! Hot files on 09/02/17
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/20b27b84884a1fe60cd8e7e81d55a238.png[/img]
[/color]
────────────────────────────────────────────

Compatibility :
Any other mods that replace ice meshes.

Tools :
NifSkope
NifSkopeUtilsSuite

Credits :
Bethesda
NifSkope people

If I missed someone or there's edits in my mod from other mods (pretty hard to know when you're running +500 mods) , please tell me.



And thx to the information out there.

[font=Georgia]MY OTHER MODS
[/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83051?][img]https://i.gyazo.com/37db390ce6d3a780a3abe407836a3753.jpg[/img][/url]

[/size][/font][/size][/center]
author: GaiusFatCat
